item.title: Rand Paul says GOP colleagues 'don’t give a s‑‑- about these people in the boats': They 'say they’re pro-life'

item.title: GOP senator suggests Fed chair Powell resign now to dodge potential criminal indictment
item.description: Sen. Kevin Cramer suggests Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell should resign amid a DOJ criminal probe into Fed headquarters renovation project costs.
